data.title: Eidesvik Offshore Secures Contract Extensions with Aker BP
data.description:
Eidesvik Offshore ASA ( (DE:E1V) ) has provided an announcement.

Eidesvik Offshore ASA has announced that Aker BP ASA has extended the contract for their supply vessel Viking Lady until February 2027, and the firm period for Viking Prince has been extended by approximately three months to February 2026. This extension reflects the strong collaboration between Eidesvik Offshore ASA and Aker BP ASA, potentially enhancing Eidesvik’s market position and ensuring continued operational stability.

data.title: Lobo Technologies Regains Nasdaq Compliance
data.description:
An announcement from Lobo EV Technologies Ltd. ( (LOBO) ) is now available.

Lobo EV Technologies Ltd., a company operating in the electric vehicle sector, recently received confirmation from Nasdaq that it has regained compliance with the minimum bid price requirement for continued listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market. This follows a notification in May 2025 that the company was not in compliance. As of October 30, 2025, the company’s Class A ordinary shares have maintained a closing bid price of $1.00 or greater for 10 consecutive business days, resolving the issue and ensuring its continued presence on the market.

The most recent analyst rating on (LOBO) stock is a Hold with a $1.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Lobo EV Technologies Ltd. stock, see the LOBO Stock Forecast page.

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, LOBO is a Neutral.

However, significant profitability and liquidity challenges, coupled with a negative valuation score, weigh heavily on the overall assessment. The stock’s overbought technical indicators suggest caution.

data.title: Perfect Moment Ltd. Extends Loan Maturity Date
data.description:
Perfect Moment Ltd. ( (PMNT) ) has issued an update.

On August 26, 2025, Max Gottschalk, Chairman of the Board of Perfect Moment Ltd., extended loans totaling $5,089,960 to the company to support its operations and product purchases. These loans were initially set with a maturity date of November 8, 2025, for a portion of the amount. On October 30, 2025, the company and Gottschalk amended and restated one of the promissory notes, extending its maturity date to March 9, 2026, which provides the company with additional time to manage its financial obligations.

The most recent analyst rating on (PMNT) stock is a Hold with a $0.50 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Perfect Moment Ltd. stock, see the PMNT Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on PMNT Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, PMNT is a Neutral.

The overall stock score is primarily impacted by significant financial challenges, including negative profitability and high leverage. Technical indicators show neutral momentum, while valuation metrics are weak due to negative earnings and lack of dividends.

To see Spark’s full report on PMNT stock, click here.

More about Perfect Moment Ltd.

data.title: Argyle Resources Secures C$500,000 in First Tranche of LIFE Offering
data.description:
An announcement from Argyle Resources Corp. ( (TSE:ARGL) ) is now available.

Argyle Resources Corp. has successfully closed the first tranche of its LIFE Offering, raising C$500,000 through the sale of units priced at C$0.20 each. The proceeds are earmarked for legal, accounting, marketing, mineral exploration, and general working capital. This financial move positions Argyle to advance its exploration activities and strengthen its market presence in the mineral exploration industry.

More about Argyle Resources Corp.

Argyle Resources Corp. is a junior mineral exploration company focused on acquiring, exploring, staking, and evaluating natural resource properties in North America. The company holds a 100% interest in several projects in Québec, Canada, and has options for additional properties in Ontario and Nova Scotia. Argyle collaborates with the National Institute of Scientific Research for exploration programs on its silica projects.

Average Trading Volume: 69,734

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

data.title: Integrated Media Technology Faces Nasdaq Delisting Threat
data.description:
The latest announcement is out from Integrated Media Technology ( (IMTE) ).

On October 30, 2025, Integrated Media Technology Limited received a delisting determination letter from Nasdaq due to non-compliance with filing requirements, specifically failing to file its Form 20F for the year ended December 31, 2024. The company plans to request a hearing to delay suspension or delisting, which will temporarily halt any action for 15 days, pending further review. This situation highlights challenges in maintaining compliance with Nasdaq’s listing rules, potentially impacting stakeholders and the company’s market position.

More about Integrated Media Technology

Integrated Media Technology Limited (IMTE) is an Australian company involved in trading Halal products, manufacturing and selling nano coated plates for filters, and producing electronic glass.

Average Trading Volume: 402,481

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Sell

Current Market Cap: $3.14M

data.description:
